page.title: 01HAVANT,LEIGH PARK,FARLINGTON
page.content: This area is mostly built on. Havant has grown from an old village centre. Leigh Park is a huge area of council houses.Farlington is a suburb of Portsmouth,built in the 1920's. The "Havant Gap" runs north/south and is an area of open country.Langstone Harbour is in the south.Langstone village is on a peninsula that connects,by bridge,with HaylingIsland. Havant area is growing rapidly,with new houses and new factories.The largest firm is IBM,which makes {computers..Transport}is a major theme for the area,with a motorway intersection and a main railway line. {Leisure}is important,with good facilities for most sports.The city of Portsmouth is where many people work and shop.
